channel.title: Can't See BAY in my QT Wallet
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
QT Wallet, Client Wallet (and version) or Web wallet: 3.0.2b Operating System and version: Windows 10
I did it 1. ../../../forum-archive/t/how-to-import-your-bitbay-web-wallet-private-key-into-the-peg-enabled-qt-wallet/2249 2. ../../../forum-archive/t/how-to-rescan-within-the-bitbay-qt-wallet-pc/2327
I imported a private key from following the instructions(1.) and it imports successfully. But I can't see my funds in QT Wallet.
I also upload my QT wallet capture.
What do I have to do?
(오래된 means old)
![bitbay|690x262](upload://frBRIG4QArrKggVu4zizxNpEMTM.png)

item.title: Can't See BAY in my QT Wallet
item.dc:creator: @LEEJIHOON
item.description:
@LEEJIHOON wrote:

How can i synced 100%?

Also I did it.

How to ensure you are on the correct chain (QT version) Support
Please follow these steps to ensure you are on the correct chain: 1. Open the QT wallet, and click on “Help” -> “Debug Window”. [15%20PM] 2. Then, under the “Console” tab, type: getblock e89164a165df952a3bc4b80d9ea33c3be47baa2406bbd7c9bd04eb91bd11e23a [15%20AM] 3. Then press the enter key. If you see the following results, then you are on the correct chain: [59%20AM] If you instead see “Block not found” only, then you are on an incorrect chain. Please contact the BitBay team for further sup…

But message is Block not found (code-5)

Read full topic
item.source: Can't See BAY in my QT Wallet

item.title: Can't See BAY in my QT Wallet
item.dc:creator: @LEEJIHOON
item.description:
@LEEJIHOON wrote:

My system has the following specifications

QT Wallet, Client Wallet (and version) or Web wallet: 3.0.2b
Operating System and version: Windows 10

I did it

  1. How to import your BitBay Web Wallet private key into the peg-enabled QT wallet
  2. How to rescan within the BitBay QT Wallet (PC)

I imported a private key from following the instructions(1.) and it imports successfully. But I can’t see my funds in QT Wallet.

I also upload my QT wallet capture.

What do I have to do?

(오래된 means old)

bitbay.PNG790x301 4.61 KB

Read full topic
